title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
Use the (Ranger) option "Show mercy, ending her life swiftly" with the sick Hyena you encounter in the Risen Road

Be a Ranger when you meet the Dying Hyenas in the Risen Road.

Risen Road - The location where the dead bodies and sick hyena is. Close by the Bridge entering the Risen Road and directly to its East
